shinyMobile

Develop outstanding {shiny} apps for iOS and Android, as well as beautiful {shiny} gadgets. {shinyMobile} is built on top of the latest Framework7 template.


Sandbox

The best way to discover {shinyMobile} is to play with it. Here is a sandbox where you can test it out:

Installation

You can install {shinyMobile} in the usual ways:

# from CRAN
install.packages("shinyMobile")

# for the latest version
devtools::install_github("RinteRface/shinyMobile")

Demo

{shinyMobile} knows three themes:

  • ios: for iOS
  • md: for Android
  • auto: either iOS or Android, depending on the device


Android

Using the md theme:

iOS

Using the ios theme:
